name: Mercure Palermo Centro

reviews.text: Liked
reviews.title: so-so

reviews.text: - Clean (especially compared to the rest of Palermo)
reviews.title: Who needs the Cristal Palace?
Dependable, good value hotel for exploring Palermo
reviews.text: - Pretty good location
- Reception staff friendly and spoke english fairly well
reviews.title: Nice hotel-excellent location
Good value for money, convenient location
reviews.text: Didn't Like
THis Hotel is in central city location. A few blocks / mins walk from airport bus stop. Get off at main square Plazza Castelnuovo or also known as Politeama. Bus goes onto central station after.
reviews.title: Central City Hotel
Very nice and very helpful!
reviews.text: We arrived at 11PM and walked to Hotel. Safe / Busy well lit streets. Very comfortable at this time of night. Experienced area around hotel often late in evening and always seemed safe and friendly. Bag snatches can be a threat in any city though.

reviews.title: Good location but.....
reviews.text: The Hotel seems to have a mixture of Business and tourists and seemed ideal for both. A good buffet breakfast is available until 10am and included in price. (Bacon and egss only hot but very good continental choice)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms are not typical Mercure decoration with more chic appearance. Good size, many with balcony be it street view, some without.
reviews.title: Fine parking, central hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very helpful reception staff.
reviews.title: Hotel average but great location

reviews.text: We had a triple room which was good enough for 4 people. The breakfast was great and the location of the hotel is excellent for a 2 days visit to the town.
reviews.title: I would recommend this hotel to anyone.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel could use a small renovation ( new airconditioning asap) and the hotel staff is not very friendly.
reviews.title: clean convenient good value

reviews.text: We got an extremely good deal from booking.com, so I should not complain for any of the above.
reviews.title: A really good-value hotel...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: it's close to the port with a corner shop/fruit shop nearby.
reviews.title: Good place in Palermo

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: one down side is that its not very close to the train station though but there's a bus station within 5-10min walk for bus 101 102 to the train station
reviews.title: Convenient, clean, front door unloading & valet parking ,

reviews.text: Hotel was clean and in a good location, Reception guy was very friendly and spoke good English. Room was a normal size for a European capital city with big bed and spotless bathroom with free toiletries. Balcony was ok but had no furniture to sit on. No safe in room but it didn't affect me as only spent one night there. Breakfast was great- typical Italian with breads, cheese, meat, fruit, cereal, yoghurt, tea and coffee and plenty of Italian Tortes (cakes)
reviews.title: Not a Bad Hotel. Great Location
Poor value for money
reviews.text: Negative: The receptionist didn't explain that in order to keep the electricity active, you had to keep your room card inserted into the little box by the door- needless to say I was pretty confused at first as to why the lights kept going out!!
I would not stay at this hotel again as it is poor value for your money. The positives: good room size, ok location (about 5-10mins into the heart of town) and decent breakfast with wide variety.
reviews.title: Could do with a freshen up !

reviews.text: The bad things: Shower was hopeless as the door didn't shut properly. Therefore, you had to point shower head in a certain direction so water didn't escape which was not comfortable as the shower is very small. Unfortunately, we didn't know the door was broken the first time we showered and we accidently flooded the bathroom floor. We informed reception and asked if they could help get some buckets & mops, it took them nearly an hour to turn up by which time, we had used all the towels to mop the floor ourselves.
reviews.title: Stay somewhere else!

likes.disliked: — Cleanliness not good and surly staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Although the room is a good size, it did not feel very clean, dirty marks on the carpet and on the walls. It also felt very dark in our room (dark furniture, black carpet with lots of stains).
reviews.title: Cannot Recommend

description: The new Mercure Palermo Centro is located in the city centre, 200 meters from Teatro Politeama and Teatro Massimo. This 4 star hotel offers 93 soundproofed rooms, a stylish hall, bar and internet point. Ideal for business and tourist stays.
